title: Overview

- day of week (\"1\" - Monday, \"7\" - S: select" (selection by buyer from available customizations based on min/max)

definitions.categories: here? As per the footer note in the api contract, this is either category from taxonomy sheet (i.e ONDC:RET14) or its a custom category used for creating variants.
definitions.start_time: BNP pulls incremental updates fromstart_timetoend_timein a single solicited response;
definitions.NACK: refresh couldn’t be ingested and could happen because the incremental refresh being shared for specific provider(s) / location(s) / item(s) are not found on the BNP cache or for other reasons. BNP should use these error codes / message in the NACK response:
definitions.will: adding back the delivery discount, the aggregate of which should not exceed the corresponding discount amount;
definitions.this: reversal of the offer can add back, in aggregate, a maximum of ₹75 to the order value;
definitions.highlighting: - not to be used, will be removed in future version;
definitions.above: preference is to display this menu item from Monday to Friday from 1800 to 2200; if not specified, indicates preference for displaying this menu item as per store timings;
definitions.it: the BNP will pay the SNP an interest of 10.00% per annum (i.e. INR 100), calculatedpro ratafor each day of delay. So if the BNP delay was 50 days, the total interest payable would be INR 13.70 [calculated as 1000x(10.00/100)x(50/365)]
definitions.defining: leaving the parameter "undefined" or "empty string" has to be passed?
definitions.Array: all items and all categories of that provider id supports discounts ?
definitions.for: the provider, of type "custom_group" for this id;
definitions.is: at the fulfillment level and based on the fulfillment state & reason codes and includes associated cancellation fees (if any):
definitions.including: id, name, min / max, input type, sequence of display;
